data: {"generalSituation":"Tropical Cyclone Fung-wong will move towards the vicinity of Taiwan and weaken gradually tomorrow. With Fung-wong departing, the coast of Guangdong will then be dominated by the northeast monsoon. It will be windy with swells and the weather will be slightly cooler over the region. Under the persistent influence of a relatively dry monsoon, the weather will improve over southern China in the latter part of this week. A strong northeast monsoon is expected to reach the coast of southern China early next week. The weather will become cool appreciably over the region.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251112","week":"Wednesday","forecastWind":"North force 4 to 5, force 6 offshore at first, occasionally up to force 8 on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. One or two light rain patches at first. Sunny intervals during the day.
